details.description:
In your capacity as a Data Science Manager, you will play a pivotal role in fostering data-informed decision-making throughout our organization. Your responsibilities encompass guiding a team of Data Scientists, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to distill valuable insights from intricate datasets, crafting AI and ML models, and furnishing strategic recommendations. This position entails the need to collaborate with the business team to comprehend business challenges and transform them into Data Science problems, ensuring the timely delivery of projects. Your proficiency in Data Analysis, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning will prove instrumental in addressing intricate business dilemmas and propelling innovation. Furthermore, this role anticipates your leadership in NLP-centric projects, where you will oversee their execution and leverage cutting-edge methods to glean valuable insights from textual data.


Responsibilities:

  • Manage a team of Data Scientists, providing guidance, mentoring, and support to ensure high-quality work and professional development.
  • Collaborate with other teams, including department heads, product managers, and business stakeholders, to understand their Data needs and provide Data Science solutions.
  • Responsible for delivering results. You should set and measure Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for your team and take necessary actions to achieve the desired outcomes.
  • Understanding the needs of internal and external stakeholders is vital. You should ensure that Data Science projects align with customer requirements and bring value to the organization
  • Work with the Data Scientists and the other teams to:
  • Identify, collect, and preprocess large and complex data sets from various sources, ensuring data quality and integrity.
  • Apply statistical analysis techniques and Machine Learning algorithms to extract actionable insights and patterns from data.
  • Analyze the output from the Data Science models and present it to the Business stakeholders.
  • Work closely with senior leadership to understand business goals and define data-driven strategies to achieve them.
  • Provide strategic recommendations based on Data Analysis to improve operational efficiency, optimize processes, and drive business growth.
  • Conduct research and stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Data Science techniques and tools, and identify opportunities for their application within the organization.
  • Present complex data analysis results and technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders in a clear and concise manner.
  • Collaborate with Data Visualisation experts to create interactive and visually appealing dashboards and reports to effectively communicate insights.
  • Collaborate with Product/Program Managers to align Data Science with the Product vision.
  • Ensure compliance with Data Privacy and Security regulations while handling sensitive data.
  • Adhere to ethical guidelines and promote responsible data practices within the team and the organization.
  • Preparing and presentingData Analysis results and Technical Concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
  • Work in coordination with the Data Annotation team to ensure the prompt delivery of data to the Data Science team.
  • Designing AI and ML solutions that can solve business problems
  • Working with both structured and unstructured data
  • Researching and developing new AI and ML techniques
  • Working with CNN, RNN, LSTM, Transformers, and LLMs.
  • Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis.
  • Mentoring new joiners


Requirements:

  • Effective communication and presentation abilities with the ability to translate technical concepts into actionable insights for non-technical stakeholders.
  • Leadership and team management skills, with the ability to motivate and guide a team of high quality Data Scientists.
  • Strong expertise in Data Analysis, Statistical Modeling, Machine Learning, and AI models.
  • Proficiency in Python and experience with data manipulation and analysis libraries (e. g., Pandas, NumPy, SciPy).
  • Hands-on experience with Machine Learning and Deep Learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn.
  • Experience with Deep Learning models for NLP, such as Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs), Transformers, and Large Language Models (LLMs).
  • Proficiency in configuring and constructing models utilising GPU / TPU technologies.
  • Solid understanding of database systems, SQL, and data warehousing concepts.
  • Excellent problem-solving and critical-thinking skills, with the ability to handle complex and ambiguous business problems.
  • Familiarity with Git and Docker is a prerequisite.
  • Familiarity with Big Data technologies (e. g., Hadoop, Spark) and cloud platforms (e. g., AWS, Azure) is a plus.
  • Knowledge of data visualisation tools (e. g., Excel, Tableau, Power BI) and experience in creating compelling visualisations is desirable.
  • Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, or equivalent fields from Tier-1 college.
  • Proven experience of 8+ years in the Data Science field, with a track record of delivering impactful solutions and leading large teams.
  • Deep understanding of Machine Learning algorithms & principles (text classification, information extraction, text summarization, object detection, regression analysis, probabilistic models), and their application.
  • Familiarity with Deep Learning frameworks such as TensorFlow and PyTorch and strong experience in at least one.
  • Excellent programming skills in Python.
  • Most importantly, a can-do attitude and desire to make a difference is an absolute must.
details.title: Data Science Manager

We are looking for a Database Reliability Engineer/Sr. Database Reliability Engineer to help us build and enhance our database platforms to achieve availability, scalability and operational effectiveness. The right individual will embrace the opportunity to tackle challenging problems and use their influence to drive continual improvement. You will also work on cutting-edge technologies like MySQL, Aerospike, Elasticsearch, RocksDB, Couchbase, MongoDB, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Chef, Prometheus, etc.


Responsibilities:

  • Managing availability, performance, capacity, and security of database infrastructure like MySQL, Aerospike, Couchbase, Elasticsearch, Cassandra, ScyllaDB, MongoDB, RocksDB, PostgreSQL
  • Building and implementing observability for databases' health/performance/capacity.
  • Optimizing On-call rotations and processes.
  • Documenting tribal knowledge.
  • Conversant with concepts related to RDBMS and NoSQL databases
  • Conversant with Object Relational Mapping technology
  • Providing help in onboarding new databases and clusters with the production readiness review process.
  • Developing tools to manage Database infrastructure at scale.

  • Working with Dev and Product teams to define SLO/Error Budgets/Alerts for databases.

  • Identifying observability gaps in database services, and infrastructure and working with stakeholders to fix it.
  • Managing Outages and doing detailed RCA with developers and identifying ways to avoid that situation.
  • Managing/Automating upgrades of the database infrastructure services.
  • Automate toil work.


Requirements:

  • 4+ Years of experience as a Database Reliability Engineer on large-scale databases like MySQL, Cassandra, ScyllaDB, Aerospike, Elasticsearch, RocksDB, Couchbase, MongoDB
  • A collaborative spirit with the ability to work across disciplines to influence, learn, and deliver.
  • A deep understanding of computer science, networking and databases concepts.
  • Demonstrated experience with languages, such as Python, Bash etc.
  • Extensive experience with Linux administration and good understanding of the various linux kernel subsystems (memory, storage, network etc).
  • Extensive experience in DNS, TCP/IP, UDP, GRPC, Routing and Load Balancing.
  • Expertise of Amazon Web Services (AWS) and/or other relevant Cloud Infrastructure solutions like Microsoft Azure or Google Cloud.
  • Expertise in GitOps, Infrastructure as a Code tools such as Terraform etc is plus.
  • Experience in managing and deploying containerized environments using Docker, Mesos/Kubernetes is a plus.

Responsibilities:

  • Maintain and extend the Java-based automation test frameworks

  • participating in PRD walkthroughs, sprint planning, code reviews and providing feedback on software design and implementation.

  • Sharing daily status report to manager and weekly status report to stakeholders.


Requirements:

  • You have excellent computer science fundamentals
  • You have at least 3.5+ years of experience working in Java, Rest Assured, TesNG, Selenium, Automation Framework Design(TDD), SQL, CI/CD
  • You have experience in working on web applications that operate at a high scale.

details.description:
As a Senior QA Automation Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and executing automated test scripts to ensure the highest quality of our software products. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand requirements, identify test scenarios, and implement automated solutions. The role requires a deep understanding of software testing principles, strong programming skills, and expertise in test automation frameworks. A Senior QA Automation Engineer plays a critical role in ensuring the quality and reliability of software products through the design, development, and execution of automated test scripts.


Responsibilities:

  • Test Planning: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and define comprehensive test plans.
  • Test Case Design: Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test cases based on project specifications.
  • Execution: Perform manual testing to identify software defects, document issues, and work with development teams to ensure timely resolution.
  • Regression Testing: Conduct regression testing to ensure that new features or changes do not negatively impact existing functionality.
  • Defect Tracking: Utilize defect tracking tools to log, monitor, and report issues, and verify their resolution.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to communicate testing progress and results.
  • Process Improvement: Identify areas for process improvement and contribute to the enhancement of testing methodologies.
  • Documentation: Create and maintain test documentation, including test plans, test cases, and testing reports.
  • Automated Test Design and Development: Collaborate with QA and development teams to understand software requirements and design comprehensive automated test suites. Develop and maintain automated test scripts using industry-standard tools and frameworks.
  • Test Automation Frameworks: Design and implement test automation frameworks that support scalable and maintainable automated testing processes. Evaluate and select appropriate tools and technologies for test automation.
  • Execution and Analysis: Execute automated test suites and analyze results to identify defects, performance issues, and other quality concerns. Work closely with developers to reproduce and debug issues.
  • Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): Integrate automated tests into the CI/CD pipeline to ensure continuous and efficient testing processes. Collaborate with DevOps teams to automate testing in the deployment pipeline.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with QA, development, and product teams to understand requirements and provide feedback on testability. Mentor junior QA engineers and provide training on test automation best practices.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 7+ years of experience in software testing, with a focus on manual testing and test automation.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, or C#.
  • Experience with test automation frameworks (e. g., Selenium, Appium, JUnit).
  • Strong understanding of software testing principles and methodologies.
  • Knowledge of CI/CD processes and tools (Jenkins, Travis CI, etc. ).
  • Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Preferred:

details.description:
Team Leader in a Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) company typically includes a range of responsibilities that involve leading and managing a team of customer service representatives or other employees. Here's a sample job description for a Team Leader in a BPO:


The BPO Team Leader is responsible for overseeing a team of customer service representatives in a BPO setting. This role involves providing leadership, support, and guidance to the team to ensure that they meet and exceed performance targets, provide excellent customer service, and adhere to company policies and procedures.


Responsibilities:

  • Team Leadership:
  • Lead, coach, and mentor a team of customer service representatives.
  • Set clear performance expectations and objectives for the team.
  • Motivate and inspire team members to achieve their goals.
  • Performance Management:
  • Monitor team performance and ensure that KPIs (Key Performance Indicators) are met.
  • Provide regular feedback and conduct performance evaluations.
  • Identify areas for improvement and implement necessary training or coaching.
  • Training and Development:
  • Conduct training sessions for new team members.
  • Provide ongoing training and development opportunities to enhance team skills and knowledge.
  • Quality Assurance:
  • Ensure that all team members adhere to quality standards and best practices.
  • Monitor calls or transactions for quality and compliance.
  • Issue Resolution:
  • Handle escalated customer issues and provide resolutions.
  • Address employee concerns and grievances in a timely and effective manner.
  • Reporting and Documentation:
  • Prepare and submit regular reports on team performance to management.
  • Maintain records of team activities, performance, and customer interactions.
  • Process Improvement:
  • Identify process inefficiencies and recommend improvements.
  • Collaborate with management to implement process enhancements.
  • Compliance:
  • Ensure that the team adheres to all relevant policies, procedures, and regulations.
  • Stay updated on industry compliance requirements.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience.
  • Proven experience in a customer service or BPO environment.
  • Strong leadership and team management skills.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Knowledge of relevant software and tools used in BPO operations.
  • Problem-solving and conflict-resolution abilities.
  • Understanding of KPIs and performance metrics.
  • Willingness to work in shifts as per BPO requirements.
  • A customer-centric and service-oriented mindset.

details.description:
Responsibilities:

  • You will be working on incredibly interesting technical challenges in a product-centric and open source driven environment.
  • The role requires a good knowledge of Algorithmic Design and Architecture, Data structures, serverless architectures, building scalable and secure systems from the ground up, and the skills + GRIT to tackle complex problems amidst a high degree of uncertainty.
  • Set a very high bar on code quality and automation.
  • Take ownership of product features from conception to implementation, testing deployment and support.
  • A lot of freedom on when and where you work from - just get stuff done.
  • Open source as much as possible, and blog about cool things that you learnt and built.
  • Comfort with mentoring a team & sharing learnings on a regular basis (both internally & with the wider Dev. community)
  • You will help define how we evolve and what we stand for as a company in terms of global impact.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
  • 3+ years of experience as a Backend developer.
  • Strong knowledge of JavaScript.
  • Familiarity with NoSQL(MongoDB) and SQL(MySQL) databases.
  • Hands-on experience in building APIs with NodeJS.
  • Hands-on experience with writing serverless components.
  • Hands-on experience with microservices architecture.
  • Familiarity with developing microservices that run at scale.
  • Thirdparty API integrations.
  • Should have knowledge of any queuing/ caching systems.
  • Ability to write automation tests for the code shipped during SDLC.
  • Experience with Docker, Kubernetes and cloud platforms like AWS. We are not looking for serious DevOps expertise, just enough working knowledge for you to drive things independently and serve as a good sounding board for the team.

details.description:
Our data engineering team is focused on delivering Tripadvisor's first-in-class data products that serve all data users across the organization. As a member of the Data Platform Enterprise Services Team, you will collaborate with engineering and business stakeholders to build, optimize, maintain, and secure the full data vertical including tracking instrumentation, information architecture, ETL pipelines, and tooling that provide key analytics insights for business-critical decisions at the highest levels of Product, Finance, Sales, CRM, Marketing,


Data Science, and more. All in a dynamic environment of continuously modernising tech stack including highly scalable architecture, cloud-based infrastructure, and real-time responsiveness. Tripadvisor provides a unique, global work environment that captures the speed, innovation and excitement of a startup, at a thriving, growing and well-established industry brand. We take pride in our data engineering and are looking for a talented and highly-motivated engineer with a passion for solving interesting problems to add to our high-performing team.


Responsibilities:

  • Providing the organisation's data consumers high quality data sets by data curation, consolidation, and manipulation from a wide variety of large scale (terabyte and growing) sources.
  • Building first-class data products and ETL processes that interact with terabytes of data on leading platforms such as Snowflake and BigQuery.
  • Developing and improving Foundational datasets by creating efficient and scalable data models to be used across the organization.
  • Working with our Data Science, Analytics, CRM, and Machine Learning teams.
  • Responsible for the data pipelines' SLA and dependency management.
  • Writing technical documentation for data solutions, and presenting at design reviews.
  • Solving data pipeline failure events and implementing anomaly detection.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
  • 3+ years data engineering experience
  • Experience with technologies and toolings associated with relational databases (PostgreSQL or equivalent) and data warehouses (Snowflake, BigQuery, Hadoop/Hive, or equivalent).
  • Experience with writing and optimising SQL
  • Experience with data modeling and ETL/ELT design, including defining SLAs, performance measurements, tuning and monitoring.
  • Experience building/operating highly available, distributed systems of data extraction, ingestion, and processing of large data sets
  • Experience with programming languages such as Python, Java and/or Scala
  • Knowledge of cloud data warehouse concepts
  • Communication/people skills
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment
  • Ability to make progress on projects independently and enthusiasm for solving difficult problems
details.title: Data Engineer
